Sergeant Springer - Special Ops - Aerial Defense

  1. Let’s say I have exactly 7 cards in my hand when I flip Sergeant Springer to bot mode. Its ability triggers and I play an Action. Now I only have 6 cards in hand. Do I still get to play an Upgrade? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. Once the ability triggers, you’ll do everything it says. The trigger condition doesn’t recheck in the middle.
  2. For Showing Off, can I flip Sergeant Springer to one alt mode and use its effect then flip to the other Alt mode and use its effect too? Or must I resolve Showing Off completely first? [Source: WotC]
    Showing Off resolves completely before any abilities that triggered happen.
  3. Can the Better Things To Do Than Die stratagem be used on Sergeant Springer? [Source: Aequitas]
    No. It is solely for Autobot Springer - Aerial Defense. The lack of "Autobot" in the stratagem target is believed to be unintended.
